metadata.title: CVE-2024-26928 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:smb: client: fix potential UAF in cifs_debug_files_proc_show()Skip sessions that are being teared down (status == SES_EXITING) toavoid UAF.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
